Entries.summer_Mon8: What good is antitrust law if the government won't use it against Joja?$s
Entries.fall_Tue8: Joja has low prices precisely because they overwork their employees.#$b#They have nearly three times the injuries as other comparable companies.$s
Entries.winter_Thu10: They say Joja is the future. That innovation is worth the monopoly. Meh.$a
